English: Informs all party members of the party leader's location.
Spanish: Informa a todos los miembros de la party la localización del líder de la party.

English: The party leader orders party members to attack a target.
Spanish: El líder ordena a los miembros de la party atacar a un objetivo.

English: The party leader orders all party members to retreat.
Spanish: El líder ordena a todos los miembros de la party retirarse.

English: Increases the Critical Chance of the next attack of all party members around the leader by 0.5% per party member.
Spanish: Increases the Critical Chance of the next attack of all party members around the leader by 0.5% per party member.

English: Each party member around the leader increases the party leader's damage by 5%.
Spanish: Cada miembro de la party cercano al líder añade un 5% de bonus al daño del líder de la party.

English: Increases the chance for Masquerpets to drop unique items.
Spanish: Incrementa la probabilidad de que los Masquerpets suelten objetos únicos.

English: Party members recover 1.5 times faster. If the party leader is an Assist, party members recover 1.8 times faster.
Spanish: Los miembros de la party se recuperan 1.5 veces más rápido. Si el líder de la party es un Assist, los miembros de la party se recuperan 1.8 veces más rápido.

English: Increases the number of items dropped by Masquerpets.
Spanish: Incrementa la cantidad de items soltados por Masquerpets.

English: Each party member gains a 2.5% damage bonus for every party member nearby. This does not apply to the leader if Linked Attack is active.
Spanish: Los miembros de la party reciben un 2.5% de bonus al daño por cada miembro cercano a ellos. Este efecto no se aplica al líder si Ataque Vinculado está activo.
